title: Wonder Boy: Asha in Monster World Free Download Direct Link
description:
Asha, the protagonist of the warrior game, is involved in a serious incident that will affect the survival of her world. Our green- haired heroine does not need to save the world alone, and she sets out on an adventure with her cute flying friend, the blue Pepelogo .
Asha and Pepelogu must work together to become the heroes the world needs. There is a long road ahead – but can they save their world? An action packed side scrolling game that’s easy, fun and easy to play. The action is fast and challenging, but the game has been improved to make it easier to try again.
